message: Hi Bob, I'm selling a product that I believe would be of great value to you. I'm offering it to you for $14,000.
I appreciate the offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $12,500. Would you be willing to meet me in the middle?
Thanks for the offer, Bob. I understand your position, but the value of this product to me is quite high.  How about we settle at $13,500?
I'm still a bit hesitant, but I'm willing to meet you halfway from $13,500. How about we do $13,250?
